definition: abbr. for Canada 加拿大[Jia1 na2 da4]/surname Jia

to add/plus/(used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)

sentences.english: The score is a draw, it's going to go into overtime.
sentences.chinese: 比分打平，比赛将进入加时赛。

sentences.english: They won the match after a sudden-death play-off.
sentences.chinese: 加时赛中以突然死亡法赢得了比赛。

sentences.english: Jamison didn't score in the overtime, missing all four of his shots.
sentences.chinese: 加时赛贾米森四投零中未得分。

sentences.english: The title was decided by a sudden-death play-off.
sentences.chinese: 冠军是由突然死亡法的加时赛决定的。

sentences.english: They were forced to face another overtime without their leading scorer.
sentences.chinese: 他们的头号得分手不在，现在要面对第二个加时。

sentences.english: They scored all 12 of Miami's points in overtime;
sentences.chinese: 他们包揽了加时赛中热火的全部12分。

sentences.english: They began this week by outlasting the Washington Wizards in overtime Sunday.
sentences.chinese: 周日加时击败奇才之后，湖人将要开始本周的比赛。

sentences.english: The match ended 1-1 after extra time.
His team lost the game after overtime and a shootout.
sentences.chinese: 经过加时赛和点球，他所在的队伍输了这次比赛。

sentences.english: Please explain the overtime is independent of the post.
sentences.chinese: 加时请说明是猫扑贴贴的。

sentences.english: Love fared well in the game, eventually won by the Spurs in two overtimes .
sentences.chinese: 拉弗发挥极佳，最终帮助球队经过两个加时取胜马刺。

sentences.english: A goal the U. S. team lost to Ghana, overtime, missed the South Africa World Cup quarterfinals.
sentences.chinese: 美国队加时赛一球惜败于加纳，无缘南非世界杯八强。

definition: to win by a narrow margin/to barely win/narrow victory
end (of a performance or sports match)/last round of testing in the imperial examinations
to equalize/to level the score/to pull back the advantage
to deal the fatal blow (sports, chess etc)/to score the winning point
poised for battle/to square up for a fight
(of a team) to throw oneself into the battle
